uk.ac.gate.cloud.shop

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.gate.cloud.common.ApiObject
      • uk.ac.gate.cloud.shop.Item

  • public class Item
extends ApiObject
    "Struct" class to represent a single shop item.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String detailUrl
      The URL to query for further details, or to POST to reserve a job.
      long id
      The item ID.
      String name
      The item name.
      String onlineUrl
      URL to process documents using the online API.
      Prices price
      The pricing structure for this item.
      String shortDescription
      A short fragment of HTML describing the item.

      • Fields inherited from class uk.ac.gate.cloud.common.ApiObject

        client

      Item()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiEndpoint onlineEndpoint()
      Create an online API endpoint object that can call this item's online document processing API.

      Reserve one job based on this pipeline.

      Reserve one annotation job based on this pipeline.

      Reserve a number of annotation jobs based on this pipeline.

      Reserve a number of annotation jobs based on this pipeline.

    • Method Detail

      • reserve

        public List<Job> reserve(int quantity,
                boolean allowPayment)
        Reserve a number of annotation jobs based on this pipeline.
        Parameters:
        quantity - the number of jobs to reserve
        allowPayment - permit payment if the item has an upfront cost.
        Returns:
        one Job object per reserved job.

      • reserve

        public List<Job> reserve(int quantity)
        Reserve a number of annotation jobs based on this pipeline. If the item has an upfront cost this call will fail.
        Parameters:
        quantity - the number of jobs to reserve
        Returns:
        one Job object per reserved job.

      • reserve

        public Job reserve(boolean allowPayment)
        Reserve one annotation job based on this pipeline.
        Parameters:
        allowPayment - permit payment if the item has an upfront cost.
        Returns:
        The reserved Job.

      • reserve

        public Job reserve()
        Reserve one job based on this pipeline. If the item has an upfront cost this call will fail.
        Returns:
        the reserved Job

      • onlineEndpoint

        public ApiEndpoint onlineEndpoint()
        Create an online API endpoint object that can call this item's online document processing API.
        Returns:
        the endpoint object, or null if this item does not support the single document processing API.
